meanings.farmer: a person who owns or manages a farm
meanings.plough: a large farming implement with one or more blades fixed in a frame, drawn over soil to turn it over
meanings.lazy: unwilling to work or use energy
meanings.master: a man who has people working for him

meanings.tired: in need of sleep or rest
meanings.idea: a thought or suggestion as to a possible course of action
meanings.whip: a strip of leather or length of cord fastened to a handle, used for flogging
